attributes.action: NHS SHOULD RECEIVE A BARE MINIMUM OF 15% PAY RISE DUE TO THEIR SACRIFICES
attributes.additional_details: Throughout the outbreak of Covid-19, NHS workers have been extremely overwhelmed by the situation , some of which have unfortunately died due to contracting the disease. Hard work and commitment has gone in to helping patients recover fast and without their sacrifices deaths and fatalities would have been alarmingly high therefore as a reward ; NHS deserves the very best by giving them at least 15% pay rise as a thank you for working soo hard and making a difference to our society.
attributes.background: NHS staff/workers should receive a bare minimum of 15% pay rise due to their hard work, commitments and sacrifices throughout the outbreak of COVID 19.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151
